body.p: The Board noted that some IFRSs other than IFRS 5 require specific disclosures for non‑current assets (or disposal groups) classified as held for sale or discontinued operations. For instance, paragraph 68 of IAS 33 Earnings per Share requires an entity to disclose the amount per share for discontinued operations. The Board also noted that the requirements of IAS 1 on fair presentation and materiality also apply to such assets (or disposal groups).
